page.title: 14LIFESTYLE RACHEL'S DAY
page.content: A day in the life of a secondary school pupil. I get up at seven am and get ready for school.I wait for the coach which picks me up at eight and takes me to Harrogate.We arrive at school at eight thirty.We all go to our form rooms at nine.The bell goes for registration and after this the whole of the year goes to assembly. We sing hymns and listen to a teacher.This finishes at nine thirty.Then we all go to our lessons which last until ten thirty then it's break.I walk around school and have a drink we also get ready for the next lesson which begins at eleven Lunchtime begins at noon.I eat my lunch then go and visit other friends around school.At 1pm we all go to afternoon registration.Then we go to lessons which last until 3.45 when school finishes.I return home by 4.30.
